text: Karel Plíhal (born August 23, 1958 in Přerov, Czechoslovakia) is a Czech folk musician, singer, songwriter, poet and record producer. ==Discography== * Karel Plíhal (1985) * Imaginární hospoda (1986) – EP (with Slávek Janoušek and Nerez) * Karel Plíhal…Emil Pospíšil… (1989) * Karel Plíhal 1985-89 (1992) – compilation * Takhle nějak to bylo… (1992) * Králíci, ptáci a hvězdy (1996) * Sova sněžná (2000) – single * Kluziště (2000) * Rok ďábla (2002) – soundtrack * Nebe počká (2004) * Karel Plíhal v Telči (2005) – live album * Karel Plíhal v Olomouci (2005) – live album * Vzduchoprázdiny (2012) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Czech musicians Category:Czech poets Category:Czech singer- songwriters
title: Karel Plíhal
